pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonlinear Conditional Independence Tests // Code for a variety of nonlinear conditional independence tests: Kernel conditional independence test (Zhang et al., UAI 2011, arXiv:1202.3775), Residual Prediction test (based on Shah and Buehlmann, arXiv:1511.03334), Invariant environment prediction, Invariant target prediction, Invariant residual distribution test, Invariant conditional quantile prediction (all from Heinze-Deml et al., arXiv:1706.08576).
